enhancement.divination: Oohh! The volume of water increased.

transmutation.description: Changing the quality or aura to match something else
divination: Ohh! The water tastes sweeter than strawberry jam.
Ohh! The water tastes saltier than that pink fancy salt in your kitchen.
Ohh! The water tastes sour like pickles on a summer day.
Ohh! The water tastes bitter like my love life.
Ohh! The water tastes more umami than the MSG in Uncle Roger's fried rice.

specialization.description: Nen types distribution and relative position

emission.divination: Ooohh!! The colour of the water changed.
